function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Spread of contagious diseases due to travel restrictions and border closures","Impact":"Severe disruption of social and economic activities, including education, tourism, and trade","Mitigation":"Implementation of effective public health measures and vaccination programs, as well as international cooperation to control the spread of diseases","Technologies":"Health monitoring systems, contact tracing apps, and vaccine development","People":"General public, travelers, students, workers, and tourists","Owner":"Governments, international health organizations, and public health authorities"},{"Description":"Vulnerability of global supply chains to disease-related disruptions","Impact":"Disruption of production and trade, leading to economic losses and unemployment","Mitigation":"Diversification of supply chains, adoption of digital technologies, and increased local production","Technologies":"Blockchain for supply chain transparency, AI for demand forecasting, and 3D printing for localized manufacturing","People":"Manufacturers, suppliers, and workers in global supply chains","Owner":"Businesses, industry associations, and trade organizations"},{"Description":"Stress on healthcare systems and risk of food insecurity due to lockdowns and border restrictions","Impact":"Strain on healthcare resources, reduced access to essential services, and increased risk of malnutrition and hunger","Mitigation":"Investment in healthcare infrastructure and support for vulnerable populations, as well as targeted assistance for food distribution","Technologies":"Telemedicine, remote monitoring devices, and data analytics for healthcare management","People":"Healthcare workers, patients, vulnerable populations, and those facing food insecurity","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, government agencies, and humanitarian aid organizations"}]}
